name: AppAgg Dark Theme
description:
Application Aggregator — Apps, Developers, Discounts, Lists, RSS.

 •  More than 5,000,000 apps and 1,000,000 developers.
 •  We support all the major operating systems:
        —  Android (Google Play™)
        —  iOS (App Store™)
        —  Windows Phone (Microsoft Store™)
        —  macOS (PAD XML, App Store™)
        —  Linux (PAD XML)
        —  Windows (PAD XML)

All apps in one place!
